-- =============================================================================
-- European Soccer Events
-- Azure Synapse Analytics Demo
-- https://github.com/aessing/demo-azuresynapse
-- -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
-- Developer.......: Andre Essing (https://www.andre-essing.de/)
--                                (https://github.com/aessing)
--                                (https://twitter.com/aessing)
--                                (https://www.linkedin.com/in/aessing/)
-- -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
-- THIS CODE AND INFORMATION ARE PROVIDED "AS IS" WITHOUT WARRANTY OF ANY KIND,
-- EITHER EXPRESSED OR IMPLIED, INCLUDING BUT NOT LIMITED TO THE IMPLIED
-- WARRANTIES OF MERCHANTABILITY AND/OR FITNESS FOR A PARTICULAR PURPOSE.
-- =============================================================================

IF EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.objects WHERE NAME = 'factGameEvents' AND TYPE = 'U')
	DROP TABLE DataFlow.factGameEvents 
GO
CREATE TABLE DataFlow.factGameEvents
	(
	 id_odsp nvarchar(256),
	 id_event nvarchar(256),
	 sort_order int,
	 time int,
	 text nvarchar(256),
	 event_type int,
	 event_type2 int,
	 side int,
	 event_team nvarchar(256),
	 opponent nvarchar(256),
	 player nvarchar(256),
	 player2 nvarchar(256),
	 player_in nvarchar(256),
	 player_out nvarchar(256),
	 shot_place int,
	 shot_outcome int,
	 is_goal int,
	 location int,
	 bodypart int,
	 assist_method int,
	 situation int,
	 country nvarchar(256)
	)
WITH
	(
	DISTRIBUTION = ROUND_ROBIN,
	HEAP
	)
GO
CREATE INDEX IX_factGameEvents_is_goal_country ON DataFlow.factGameEvents(is_goal, country);
GO

-- =============================================================================
-- Dimensions
-- =============================================================================
IF EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.objects WHERE NAME = 'dimAssistMethod' AND TYPE = 'U')
	DROP TABLE DataFlow.dimAssistMethod 
GO
CREATE TABLE DataFlow.dimAssistMethod (id int NOT NULL, AssistMethod nvarchar(128) NOT NULL)
WITH (
	DISTRIBUTION = REPLICATE,
--	CLUSTERED INDEX(id)
	HEAP
)
GO
ALTER TABLE DataFlow.dimAssistMethod add CONSTRAINT PK_dimAssistMethod_id PRIMARY KEY NONCLUSTERED (ID) NOT ENFORCED
GO

IF EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.objects WHERE NAME = 'dimBodyPart' AND TYPE = 'U')
	DROP TABLE DataFlow.dimBodyPart 
GO
CREATE TABLE DataFlow.dimBodyPart (id int NOT NULL, BodyPart nvarchar(128) NOT NULL)
WITH (
	DISTRIBUTION = REPLICATE,
--	CLUSTERED INDEX(id)
	HEAP
)
GO
ALTER TABLE DataFlow.dimBodyPart add CONSTRAINT PK_dimBodyPart_id PRIMARY KEY NONCLUSTERED (ID) NOT ENFORCED
GO

IF EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.objects WHERE NAME = 'dimCountry' AND TYPE = 'U')
	DROP TABLE DataFlow.dimCountry 
GO
CREATE TABLE DataFlow.dimCountry (Country nvarchar(128) NOT NULL, CountryCode nvarchar(128) NOT NULL)
WITH (
	DISTRIBUTION = REPLICATE,
--	CLUSTERED INDEX(id)
	HEAP
)
GO
ALTER TABLE DataFlow.dimCountry add CONSTRAINT PK_dimCountry_id PRIMARY KEY NONCLUSTERED (Country) NOT ENFORCED
GO
CREATE INDEX IX_dimCountry_CountryCode ON DataFlow.dimCountry(CountryCode);
GO

IF EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.objects WHERE NAME = 'dimEventType' AND TYPE = 'U')
	DROP TABLE DataFlow.dimEventType
GO
CREATE TABLE DataFlow.dimEventType (id int NOT NULL, EventType nvarchar(128) NOT NULL)
WITH (
	DISTRIBUTION = REPLICATE,
--	CLUSTERED INDEX(id)
	HEAP
)
GO
ALTER TABLE DataFlow.dimEventType add CONSTRAINT PK_dimEventType_id PRIMARY KEY NONCLUSTERED (ID) NOT ENFORCED
GO

IF EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.objects WHERE NAME = 'dimEventType2' AND TYPE = 'U')
	DROP TABLE DataFlow.dimEventType2
GO
CREATE TABLE DataFlow.dimEventType2 (id int NOT NULL, EventType2 nvarchar(128) NOT NULL)
WITH (
	DISTRIBUTION = REPLICATE,
--	CLUSTERED INDEX(id)
	HEAP
)
GO
ALTER TABLE DataFlow.dimEventType2 add CONSTRAINT PK_dimEventType2_id PRIMARY KEY NONCLUSTERED (ID) NOT ENFORCED
GO

IF EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.objects WHERE NAME = 'dimLocation' AND TYPE = 'U')
	DROP TABLE DataFlow.dimLocation
GO
CREATE TABLE DataFlow.dimLocation (id int NOT NULL, Location nvarchar(128) NOT NULL)
WITH (
	DISTRIBUTION = REPLICATE,
--	CLUSTERED INDEX(id)
	HEAP
)
GO
ALTER TABLE DataFlow.dimLocation add CONSTRAINT PK_dimLocation_id PRIMARY KEY NONCLUSTERED (ID) NOT ENFORCED
GO

IF EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.objects WHERE NAME = 'dimShotOutcome' AND TYPE = 'U')
	DROP TABLE DataFlow.dimShotOutcome
GO
CREATE TABLE DataFlow.dimShotOutcome (id int NOT NULL, ShotOutcome nvarchar(128) NOT NULL)
WITH (
	DISTRIBUTION = REPLICATE,
--	CLUSTERED INDEX(id)
	HEAP
)
GO
ALTER TABLE DataFlow.dimShotOutcome add CONSTRAINT PK_dimShotOutcome_id PRIMARY KEY NONCLUSTERED (ID) NOT ENFORCED
GO

IF EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.objects WHERE NAME = 'dimShotPlace' AND TYPE = 'U')
	DROP TABLE DataFlow.dimShotPlace
GO
CREATE TABLE DataFlow.dimShotPlace (id int NOT NULL, ShotPlace nvarchar(128) NOT NULL)
WITH (
	DISTRIBUTION = REPLICATE,
--	CLUSTERED INDEX(id)
	HEAP
)
GO
ALTER TABLE DataFlow.dimShotPlace add CONSTRAINT PK_dimShotPlace_id PRIMARY KEY NONCLUSTERED (ID) NOT ENFORCED
GO

IF EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.objects WHERE NAME = 'dimSide' AND TYPE = 'U')
	DROP TABLE DataFlow.dimSide
GO
CREATE TABLE DataFlow.dimSide (id int NOT NULL, Side nvarchar(128) NOT NULL)
WITH (
	DISTRIBUTION = REPLICATE,
--	CLUSTERED INDEX(id)
	HEAP
)
GO
ALTER TABLE DataFlow.dimSide add CONSTRAINT PK_dimSide_id PRIMARY KEY NONCLUSTERED (ID) NOT ENFORCED
GO


IF EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.objects WHERE NAME = 'dimSituation' AND TYPE = 'U')
	DROP TABLE DataFlow.dimSituation
GO
CREATE TABLE DataFlow.dimSituation (id int NOT NULL, Situation nvarchar(128) NOT NULL)
WITH (
	DISTRIBUTION = REPLICATE,
--	CLUSTERED INDEX(id)
	HEAP
)
GO
ALTER TABLE DataFlow.dimSituation add CONSTRAINT PK_dimSituation_id PRIMARY KEY NONCLUSTERED (ID) NOT ENFORCED
GO

-- =============================================================================
-- ETL Config
-- =============================================================================
IF EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.objects WHERE NAME = 'etlConfiguration_DataFlow' AND TYPE = 'U')
	DROP TABLE config.etlConfiguration_DataFlow
GO
CREATE TABLE config.etlConfiguration_DataFlow (
	SourceSystem nvarchar(128) NOT NULL,
	SourceFolder nvarchar(128) NOT NULL,
    SourceFileName nvarchar(128) NOT NULL,
    SourceFileExtension nvarchar(16) NOT NULL,
	DestinationSchema NVARCHAR(128) NOT NULL,
	DestinationTable NVARCHAR(128) NOT NULL,
    IsActive BIT NOT NULL
)
WITH (
	DISTRIBUTION = ROUND_ROBIN,
	HEAP
)
GO
CREATE INDEX IX_etlConfiguration_DataFlow_IsActive ON Config.etlConfiguration_DataFlow(IsActive);
GO

INSERT INTO config.etlConfiguration_DataFlow (SourceSystem, SourceFolder, SourceFileName, SourceFileExtension, DestinationSchema, DestinationTable, IsActive) VALUES ('europesoccer', 'raw/dimensions.csv', 'dimAssistMethod', 'csv', 'DataFlow', 'dimAssistMethod',  1)
INSERT INTO config.etlConfiguration_DataFlow (SourceSystem, SourceFolder, SourceFileName, SourceFileExtension, DestinationSchema, DestinationTable, IsActive) VALUES ('europesoccer', 'raw/dimensions.csv', 'dimBodypart', 'csv', 'DataFlow', 'dimBodypart',  1)
INSERT INTO config.etlConfiguration_DataFlow (SourceSystem, SourceFolder, SourceFileName, SourceFileExtension, DestinationSchema, DestinationTable, IsActive) VALUES ('europesoccer', 'raw/dimensions.csv', 'dimCountry', 'csv', 'DataFlow', 'dimCountry',  1)
INSERT INTO config.etlConfiguration_DataFlow (SourceSystem, SourceFolder, SourceFileName, SourceFileExtension, DestinationSchema, DestinationTable, IsActive) VALUES ('europesoccer', 'raw/dimensions.csv', 'dimEventType', 'csv', 'DataFlow', 'dimEventType',  1)
INSERT INTO config.etlConfiguration_DataFlow (SourceSystem, SourceFolder, SourceFileName, SourceFileExtension, DestinationSchema, DestinationTable, IsActive) VALUES ('europesoccer', 'raw/dimensions.csv', 'dimEventType2', 'csv', 'DataFlow', 'dimEventType2',  1)
INSERT INTO config.etlConfiguration_DataFlow (SourceSystem, SourceFolder, SourceFileName, SourceFileExtension, DestinationSchema, DestinationTable, IsActive) VALUES ('europesoccer', 'raw/dimensions.csv', 'dimLocation', 'csv', 'DataFlow', 'dimLocation',  1)
INSERT INTO config.etlConfiguration_DataFlow (SourceSystem, SourceFolder, SourceFileName, SourceFileExtension, DestinationSchema, DestinationTable, IsActive) VALUES ('europesoccer', 'raw/dimensions.csv', 'dimShotOutcome', 'csv', 'DataFlow', 'dimShotOutcome',  1)
INSERT INTO config.etlConfiguration_DataFlow (SourceSystem, SourceFolder, SourceFileName, SourceFileExtension, DestinationSchema, DestinationTable, IsActive) VALUES ('europesoccer', 'raw/dimensions.csv', 'dimShotPlace', 'csv', 'DataFlow', 'dimShotPlace',  1)
INSERT INTO config.etlConfiguration_DataFlow (SourceSystem, SourceFolder, SourceFileName, SourceFileExtension, DestinationSchema, DestinationTable, IsActive) VALUES ('europesoccer', 'raw/dimensions.csv', 'dimSide', 'csv', 'DataFlow', 'dimSide',  1)
INSERT INTO config.etlConfiguration_DataFlow (SourceSystem, SourceFolder, SourceFileName, SourceFileExtension, DestinationSchema, DestinationTable, IsActive) VALUES ('europesoccer', 'raw/dimensions.csv', 'dimSituation', 'csv', 'DataFlow', 'dimSituation',  1)
GO
